rule_text: Combat is an attribute of some units that is presented on those units' faction sheets and technology cards.17.1 During combat, if a unit's combat roll produces a result equal to or greater than its combat value, it produces a hit.   17. 2 If a unit's combat value contains two or more burst icons, instead of rolling a single die, the player rolls one die for each burst icon when making that unit's combat rolls.         Ground Combat       Invasion       Space Combat
